title: Floral Symphony Haaram - A Modern Take on Traditional Elegance
materials: 18K Rose Gold. Features meticulously set Pink Sapphires
Yellow Sapphires and brilliant-cut Diamonds. Total gross weight 97.090 grams with GH color. Features 8.13 carats of diamond with a total of 70 fancy diamonds
features: This statement necklace features a floral motif design, with each flower intricately crafted using a variety of colored sapphires and tourmalines and white diamonds. The rose gold setting provides a warm and romantic backdrop to the gemstoneâ€™s cool hues. The design beautifully merges modern aesthetics with traditional South Indian Haaram elements of layering and elaborate craftsmanship. Delicate Milgrain detailing accentuates the floral contours.
colors: Rose Gold with a pastel palette of Pink
accented by the brilliance of White Diamonds.
occasions: Perfect for a modern bride or for making a statement at festive occasions like weddings
or a grand Sangeet ceremony. Also suitable for high-end parties and celebrations.
description: This Haaram is a captivating fusion of traditional design and modern sensibilities, making it a truly unique piece. The use of high-quality gemstones and expert craftsmanship ensures lasting beauty and value. It's a statement piece that reflects both cultural heritage and contemporary style.
